Name: Zombie riding a seagull that flies across the view
UserPrompt: zombie riding a seagull that flys across the view
ExecutionCode:
local ply = Entity(1)
local startPos = ply:EyePos() + ply:GetRight() * -500 + ply:GetUp() * 200 + ply:GetForward() * 300

-- Create the seagull
local seagull = ents.Create("npc_seagull")
seagull:SetPos(startPos)
seagull:SetAngles(Angle(0, ply:EyeAngles().y, 0))
seagull:Spawn()
seagull:Activate()
seagull:SetMoveType(MOVETYPE_NONE)

-- Create the zombie rider
local zombie = ents.Create("npc_zombie")
zombie:SetPos(startPos + Vector(0, 0, 20))
zombie:SetAngles(Angle(0, ply:EyeAngles().y, 0))
zombie:Spawn()
zombie:Activate()
zombie:SetMoveType(MOVETYPE_NONE)
zombie:SetParent(seagull)
zombie:SetLocalPos(Vector(0, 0, 10))
zombie:SetModelScale(0.7)

-- Make zombie friendly so it doesn't attack
zombie:AddEntityRelationship(ply, D_LI, 99)

-- Animate the zombie waving arms
zombie:SetSequence(zombie:LookupSequence("walk_all"))
zombie:SetPlaybackRate(2)

-- Store for cleanup
AIChaos_SeagullRide = {seagull = seagull, zombie = zombie}

-- Flight path animation
local startTime = CurTime()
local duration = 6

hook.Add("Think", "AIChaos_SeagullFlight", function()
    if not IsValid(seagull) or not IsValid(zombie) then
        hook.Remove("Think", "AIChaos_SeagullFlight")
        return
    end
    
    local elapsed = CurTime() - startTime
    local progress = elapsed / duration
    
    if progress >= 1 then
        SafeRemoveEntity(seagull)
        SafeRemoveEntity(zombie)
        hook.Remove("Think", "AIChaos_SeagullFlight")
        return
    end
    
    -- Calculate flight path across view
    local eyePos = ply:EyePos()
    local fwd = ply:GetForward()
    local right = ply:GetRight()
    local up = ply:GetUp()
    
    -- Fly from left to right with a sine wave bob
    local xOffset = Lerp(progress, -400, 400)
    local yOffset = 250
    local zOffset = 150 + math.sin(elapsed * 3) * 30
    
    local newPos = eyePos + fwd * yOffset + right * xOffset + up * zOffset
    
    seagull:SetPos(newPos)
    seagull:SetAngles(Angle(math.sin(elapsed * 2) * 10, ply:EyeAngles().y + 90, math.sin(elapsed * 4) * 15))
    
    -- Make zombie flail
    if math.random() < 0.1 then
        zombie:SetSequence(zombie:LookupSequence("attackB"))
    end
end)

-- Auto cleanup
timer.Simple(duration + 1, function()
    if AIChaos_SeagullRide then
        SafeRemoveEntity(AIChaos_SeagullRide.seagull)
        SafeRemoveEntity(AIChaos_SeagullRide.zombie)
    end
    hook.Remove("Think", "AIChaos_SeagullFlight")
end)
UndoCode:
hook.Remove("Think", "AIChaos_SeagullFlight")
if AIChaos_SeagullRide then
    SafeRemoveEntity(AIChaos_SeagullRide.seagull)
    SafeRemoveEntity(AIChaos_SeagullRide.zombie)
    AIChaos_SeagullRide = nil
end
